Uses of Interface
jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi.configurator.BeanConfigurator

  • Packages that use BeanConfigurator 
    Package Description
    jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi
    The portable extension integration SPI.
    jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi.configurator  

    • Uses of BeanConfigurator in jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi

      Methods in jakarta.enterprise.inject.spi that return BeanConfigurator 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> BeanConfigurator<T> AfterBeanDiscovery.addBean()
      Obtains a new BeanConfigurator to configure a new Bean and add it at the end of the observer invocation.
